ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Firiona Vie Quest Lead?  (OT?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, ancient & ruined library could be the one in Kaesora.  Off hand I dont recall a loom in the library but maybe.  There is a spot near the library called
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, "ancient & ruined library" could be the one in Kaesora. Off hand I
dont recall a loom in the library but maybe. There is a spot near the
library called "the loom room" but the times i was there, i did not click it
to see if it would do anything - so i guess it's entirely possible. But
there are librarys in a few kunark dungeons, iirc - one in Seb as well as
kaesora and Dalnir's iirc. Dronga/Nurga def possibilities as well.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 19, 2000 5:09 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Firiona Vie Quest Lead? (OT?)


> You say, 'hail Dionin Needlespin'
>
> Dionin Needlespin sets down a needle and thread and a bolt of cloth.
> Greetings my friend. I am the tailor of this outpost. We have limited
> supplies. I often have to preserve my tailoring supplies to [mend very
> large items].
>
> You say, 'How do you mend very large items?'
>
> Dionin Needlespin says 'I cannot use a sewing kit to mend items such as
ship
> sail. I must use my loom outside. I have the only one available in
Kunark,
> but only I am allowed to use it. I can't have other breaking it. I have
> heard there is an old one in an ancient and ruined library.
>
